hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Amr bin Al-`As:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) stopped while on his she-camel (the sub-narrator then narrated the Hadith as above, i.e)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْفُتْيَا عَلَى الدَّابَّةِ عِنْدَ الْجَمْرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: To give religious verdicts while riding an animal
